front.title: Extensions to Proxy Mobile IPv6 - Motivation

abstract.t: Proxy Mobile IPv6 is a network-based mobility management protocolstandardized in IETF and is being specified in various systemarchitectures as a protocol for building a common and accessindependent mobile core. Currently, there are number of proposalsand a huge amount of interest in NETEXT working group for extendingthe protocol to support various mobility extensions. This documentidentifies some of the critical extensions that are absolutelyrequired and builds a case as why these extensions have to besupported.
